rooms.description: A welcoming entrance area with a small reception area and coat closet. Incorporates Vastu principles by aligning the entrance to the northeast for positive energy flow.
A versatile living space that serves as a combined dining and entertainment area. Large window openings to the south for natural light.
Compact and efficient kitchen with modern fixtures. Placed adjacent to the living area to maintain a sense of continuity.
Spacious studio bedroom with a dedicated balcony overlooking the garden. Positioned to maximize natural light and ventilation.
Central open space that doubles as a common living area and work studio. Features a large garden integrated into the design.

openings.description: Main entrance door located on the northeast side of the plot, in accordance with Vastu principles.
Balconies adjoining the studio bedroom for private outdoor space.
Large opening leading to the garden area from the living studio.
